Content => Dialogue: Bidoum: I can't believe we got run out of town like that. What a bunch of ingrates... All this for a lack of food? If that's all it took, I'd should have gone hunting myself!
Bidoum: Still... I think it's the perfect time to make our dream come true! To create our own travelling city! The biggest in the world!
Bidoum: To start with, we need to learn how to move around and change the biomes around us using our Terranite cards. That's the basics for a travelling city.
Bidoum: Perfect, you've understood perfectly how to use terranite cards! They're indispensable for survival these days. Now try to get even more of them!
Bidoum: Whew, that was close! You handled the situation and the volcano very well, congratulations! I have a feeling you're going to be a great mayor...
Bidoum: Oh dear... I didn't notice where we were heading, look where we are! Do your best to resist the poison!
Bidoum: We almost died because of me, you saved our lives... Thank you so much! After all these adventures, I think it's finally time to start building our city! Let’s go!
Welcome to the lands of Landorim, where magic and the races that inhabit these lands live in perfect harmony.
That was until a meteorite made of a powerful magical material called "Terranite" crashed into these lands.
The appearance of this material made the world a much more dangerous place, leading to the creation of itinerant cities to avoid threats.
30 years after this event, you and your best friend find yourselves in trouble…
Guard voice: Go away ! You're not welcome here anymore!
Cliquez sur une carte pour l’inspecter. Puis jouez une carte de ta main.
Déplacez la compagnie sur un biome juxtaposé.
Si ta pioche atteint 0 cartes, l’expédition se conclue en un échec, soyez vigilant.e !
Une quête vous est donnée en début de partie. Cette quête est votre condition de victoire.
